attributes.action: To stop the proposed idea of enforcing a speed restriction on motorbikes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Today on the 29/03/2007.A group of MP's have proposed that speed restriction should be put on motorbikes.The group of MP's are claiming that it will bring the death toll down for motorbikers.

This petition is to stop this proposal, victimisation, and violation of your human rights!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
